price: 41. ama koros diggah nanu ken baaxo fakak derfaafik tet daggosnam mayablaanaa? muslimiin qeebit ken baaxot abta xibixit, Yalli meklaah kay mekla ciggiile mayan, usuk cisab sissikik kay digaalat asissike woonay.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ لَا مُعَقِّبَ لِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā natī al-arḍa nanquṣuhā min aṭrāfihā wal-lahu yaḥkumu lā muʿaqqiba liḥuk'mihi wahuwa sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
